summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of a portion of the Alley in Block 10, Green Lake Reservoir Addition, being that portion of the alley between 15th Avenue Northeast and 16th Avenue Northeast, from East 80th Street to Bothell Way; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14271 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
